ygData.subject: in response to lag issue...
ygData.msgSnippet: I always seem to notice exceptionally high amounts of lag right after a new patch - don t know if that is coincidence or not, just personal experience.   I
ygData.messageBody:
I always seem to notice exceptionally high amounts of lag right after a new patch - don't know if that is coincidence or not, just personal experience. I have also experience 10-15 second lag spikes where my lag-o-meter does not show packet-loss. However, my entire group also experienced these lag spikes without packet-loss meter moving also... thus I can safely guess it is not ALL of our computers acting up at once.. Others in the zone comment over /ooc about lag sometimes too - always at the same time.

Don't know what to do about it cept just hope it passes... but I don't think it is always PC related... even when meter not showing lag.

And in response to teen's hunting - from about level 18-22 I hunted aviak guards in lake rathe (and some undead there at night) and found it to be GREAT experience if you can find a good group :) Gets a little crowded at peak times..but a cleric can usually find his/her way into any group ;)

Just my thoughts ;)

Sirensa Qi'Seraph
Dark Elf Cleric, Solusek Ro Server
